src_original: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṃganadīvālukopamāṃ  6 kalpāṃs tiṣṭhan* śrotaāpanneṣu dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sakṛdāgāmiṣv anāgāmiṣv arhatsu  pratyekabuddheṣu tathāgateṣv arhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpaye tat kiṃ manyase subhūte
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 若有菩薩行般若波羅蜜，以恒邊沙劫之壽為須陀洹作功德，及羅漢、辟支佛作功德，至三耶三佛作善本。

src_original: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittair avaivartiko bodhisatvo  11 mahāsatvaḥ prabhāvyate /  sādhu bhagavan gaṃbhīragaṃbhīrasthānāni nirdeṣṭavyāni /  yatra sthitvā bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayati /  yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ
tgt_original: 能以恒邊沙劫之壽，歎說阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩功德，像貌相行具足，所入所住深奧之慧，行六波羅蜜具足三十七品及薩云然，可令人得知是阿惟越致菩薩摩訶薩功德者不？

src_original: 7 api nu sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ tatonidanaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet* āha /
tgt_original: 於意云何，其人功德寧為多不？

src_original: bhagavān āha /  ayam eva subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet*  8 ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ yogam āpadyeta /
tgt_original: 」佛言： 「不如是菩薩行般若波羅蜜如中教，其功德不可計。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmīm atikramya  9 bodhisatvanyāmam avakrāmati /  yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyate /
tgt_original: 何以故？ 菩薩行般若波羅蜜，已過羅漢、辟支佛地故，從菩薩位成至阿耨多羅三耶三菩故。

tgt_original: 須菩提！
